metadata.title: CVE-2018-17457 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An object lifecycle issue in Blink could lead to a use after free inWebAudio in Google Chrome prior to 69.0.3497.81 allowed a remote attackerto execute arbitrary code inside a sandbox via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
